* BrightBlade suddenly smelt something, some sort of gas...but she couldn't 
quite place the scent.
Then, all of a sudden her systems wavered and fizzed.
Stasis gas! Gas that was meant to put her into stasis until the enemy could 
find her and remove the cloaking device.
She growled. Clever bastards!
Reaching into her leg compartment she took out a small air mask which 
cloaked her voice as well.
However, it had to be programed to do so.
She lifted her snout so that it was above the rising gas, lifting her arms 
above her head and watching her fingers as they fiddles with wires.
There! It was done!
BrightBlade quickly snapped the mask over her snout and breathed in a sigh.
That was close!
But then her scanners allerted her, there was a bot heading towards the 
chamber. Signature told her that it was that Rex, bot.
She growled and readied her gun, she may not kill him, but she'll injure 
him!*
